content.rendered:
NOIR GLAM

I’m so excited to announce that D’Lashes is expanding with more new products! We just added beautiful new black scented candles that will be available online next week! We are also adding new lashes, new lash glue, and so much more to come! What better way to celebrate our new black candles than with a new glam Noir post with my favorite look from FWRD.COM.

Also, vintage bags like Fendi, Prada, and Dior saddle bags are super popular at the moment. If you have one in your closet then it’s time to get them out! If you want to invest in a good quality designer vintage bag then I recommend getting them from therealreal.com. They have tons of different selections and have great weekly deals like this black vintage Fendi bag. Look is from  FWRD.COM 

P.S. Get ready for Summer getaways with perfect lashes! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only).  Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here.  

LOVE DIONNE
